byline.original: By LESLIE PICKER and CHAD BRAY

lead_paragraph: The offering would be the second time in four years that the exchange has tried to go public, after technical issues scuttled its last attempt.

headline.print_headline: BATS Global Markets to Price Initial Public Offering Shares at $17 to $19
headline.main: BATS Global Markets Plans to Price Shares at $17 to $19

snippet: The offering would be the second time in four years that the exchange has tried to go public, after technical issues scuttled its last attempt.
abstract: Electronic stock exchange operator BATS Global Markets will begin testing investor demand for its shares, four years after its first attempt, with initial public offering of about $202 million at midpoint; shareholders, which include Bank of America and Knight Capital Group, plan to sell initial shares at $17 to $19 each.
